sense.gloss: overwhelming strength, extremely strong person, powerhouse, very strong player, very strong team
thunderbolt, Indra's weapon, Buddhist symbol of the indestructible truth
Vajrasattva, Supreme Being of tantric Buddhism

sdata.j: なるほど↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑剛↑↓ごう↓↑速球↑↓そっきゅう↓↑投手↑↓とうしゅ↓だが、よく↑荒↑↓あ↓れる。
sdata.e: It is true he has a good fast ball, but he is often wild.

sdata.j: なるほど↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑剛↑↓ごう↓↑速球↑↓そっきゅう↓だが、よくあれる。
sdata.e: It is true that he has a good fast ball, but he is often wild.

sdata.j: ↑見↑↓み↓た↑目↑↓め↓には↑優↑↓やさ↓しそうだけど、↑彼↑↓かれ↓って↑皆↑↓みんな↓から↑外柔内剛↑↓がいじゅうないごう↓の↑結構↑↓けっこう↓なタフネゴシエータと↑言↑↓い↓われているよ。
sdata.e: He seems like a softy on the surface, but at the core he's got an iron will that makes him an extremely tough negotiator.

sdata.j: ↑柔↑↓やわ↓よく↑剛↑↓ごう↓を↑制↑↓せい↓す。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑剛↑↓ごう↓↑速球↑↓そっきゅう↓↑投手↑↓とうしゅ↓です。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は１０マイル↑競争↑↓きょうそう↓を↑走↑↓はし↓るほど↑剛健↑↓ごうけん↓だった。
sdata.e: She was strong enough to run a 10-mile race.

words.gloss: overwhelming strength, extremely strong person, powerhouse, very strong player, very strong team
